original: @165b * // thugs rje chen po dpag bsam gyi shing can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @165b * // thugs rje chen po dpag bsam gyi shing can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great compassionate one, the wish-fulfilling tree.

original: dpag med bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab smin pa'i rgyus //
analyzed: dpag med bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab smin pa'i rgyus //
translated: By the power of the accumulation of merit and wisdom,

original: gang sku mi gtod dpag bsam shing chen bsil grib can //
analyzed: gang sku mi gtod dpag bsam shing chen bsil grib can //
translated: The great wish-fulfilling tree, whose body is not exhausted, provides shade.

original: 'gro ba'i don du shin tu rmad byung sku ston pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du shin tu rmad byung sku ston pa //
translated: The one who displays the wondrous body for the benefit of beings,

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che mnga' 'dir mnyes brjod //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che mnga' 'dir mnyes brjod //
translated: The lord Avalokite≈õvara, the great compassionate one, is praised here.

original: thog mar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: thog mar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
translated: First, the great lord of yogins should cultivate the four brahmavihƒÅras.

original: phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa sgyur ba'i rim pas rgyas btab la /
analyzed: phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa sgyur ba'i rim pas rgyas btab la /
translated: Through the process of transformation, purifying the outer and inner, and so on, seal it.

original: bdag ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i dang la gnas pas /
analyzed: bdag ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i dang la gnas pas /
translated: Abiding in the samƒÅdhi of the king,

original: rin po che'i sa gzhi las mngon par byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga dang / me tog dang 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyas pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i sa gzhi las mngon par byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga dang / me tog dang 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyas pa /
translated: The inconceivable branches, flowers, and fruits of the wish-fulfilling tree that arises from the jeweled ground flourish.

original: spos kyi ngad zhim pos bsrung zhing de las grub pa'i sil snyan gyi sgras chos kyi sgo thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: spos kyi ngad zhim pos bsrung zhing de las grub pa'i sil snyan gyi sgras chos kyi sgo thams cad yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He is protected by the sweet scent of incense and the sound of cymbals made from that, which perfectly reveals all the doors of Dharma.

original: lha'i bu dang bu mo la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bstod cing phu dud byas pa'i sdong bu chen po la bzhugs pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i bu dang bu mo la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bstod cing phu dud byas pa'i sdong bu chen po la bzhugs pa ni /
translated: He is praised and revered by quintillions of gods, goddesses, and so forth, and sits on a great stalk.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kun nas 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kun nas 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po /
translated: He is the noble Avalokite≈õvara, the king of the array of all-sided light rays.

original: kun du zhal kha dog bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyis rab tu mdzes pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis mi g-yo bar bzhugs shing /
analyzed: kun du zhal kha dog bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyis rab tu mdzes pa rdo rje skyil mo krung gis mi g-yo bar bzhugs shing /
translated: He is completely four-colored, very beautiful with eight arms, and sits unmoving in vajra posture.

original: 'od dpag tshad gcig pas btsun mo dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lham me lhang nger gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tshad gcig pas btsun mo dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lham me lhang nger gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: With a light of one league, he illuminates the mandala of the retinue with the queen, shining brightly.

original: chags bral chags pa'i kha dog can //
analyzed: chags bral chags pa'i kha dog can //
translated: He is the color of passionless passion,

original: nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa'i sku //
analyzed: nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa'i sku //
translated: his body adorned with blazing jewels.üîΩHe is the queen who is never satisfied with gazing at him,

original: blta bas mi ngoms btsun mo dang // lhan cig 'jigs skyob la sogs 'khyud //
analyzed: blta bas mi ngoms btsun mo dang // lhan cig 'jigs skyob la sogs 'khyud //
translated: embracing him, protecting from fear, and so forth.

original: gzhan dag sdod bu las phye ba //
analyzed: gzhan dag sdod bu las phye ba //
translated: The others are divided into branches.üîΩThere are nine hundred and ninety-nine branches,

original: dgu brgya dgu bcu dgu yal ga / zla ba nyi ma sogs steng du /
analyzed: dgu brgya dgu bcu dgu yal ga / zla ba nyi ma sogs steng du /
translated: above the moon, sun, and so forth,

original: skal bzang sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mdzad//
analyzed: skal bzang sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mdzad//
translated: the fortunate Buddha smiles.üîΩThe ≈öƒÅkya king is in the heart,

original: @166a * // sh'akya'i rgyal po thugs ka dang // 'od dpag med dpal cod pan dang // smin mtshams na ni mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: @166a * // sh'akya'i rgyal po thugs ka dang // 'od dpag med dpal cod pan dang // smin mtshams na ni mi bskyod pa //
translated: the crown of glory of AmitƒÅbha, Ak·π£obhya at the brow,

original: phyag mthil rdo rje mgrin sngon nyid //
analyzed: phyag mthil rdo rje mgrin sngon nyid //
translated: in the palms of the hands, and in the throat.

original: gang dag 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan //
analyzed: gang dag 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan //
translated: Those in this world and others,

original: bkra shis rdzas dang nor dang 'bru //
analyzed: bkra shis rdzas dang nor dang 'bru //
translated: auspicious substances, wealth, and grain,

original: me tog rgyan dang mchod rdzas sman //
analyzed: me tog rgyan dang mchod rdzas sman //
translated: flowers, ornaments, offering substances, and medicine‚Äî

original: gang yod ma lus 'dir sbrul bya //
analyzed: gang yod ma lus 'dir sbrul bya //
translated: whatever exists, all of it, emanate here.

original: beed'ur rang bzhin sdong bu rab tu kun nas brjid chags 'khrungs pa yi //
analyzed: beed'ur rang bzhin sdong bu rab tu kun nas brjid chags 'khrungs pa yi //
translated: The branches of the wish-fulfilling tree, the nature of vaid≈´rya,

original: yal ga bzang gyes phyogs bcur 'dud rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khur khyer zhing //
analyzed: yal ga bzang gyes phyogs bcur 'dud rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khur khyer zhing //
translated: radiating splendor in all directions, bow to the perfect buddhas,

original: 'bras bu g-yur za me tog kha phye phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin ston pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu g-yur za me tog kha phye phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin ston pa //
translated: bearing the burden, with ripe fruit, open flowers, and mutually rivaling displays.

original: mkha' khyab dri ldang 'jig rten gsum skyabs dga' ba skyed par byed pa yin /
analyzed: mkha' khyab dri ldang 'jig rten gsum skyabs dga' ba skyed par byed pa yin /
translated: The tree, which is the refuge of the three worlds, is fragrant and produces joy.

original: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas gus pas rdzas dang bcas pas rim gro rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas gus pas rdzas dang bcas pas rim gro rdzogs par byas la /
translated: Having invited the awareness beings, one should complete the worship with devotion and substances.

original: sdig pa bsal ba dang / 'gro ba'i don du gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: sdig pa bsal ba dang / 'gro ba'i don du gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Having requested the removal of evil and for the sake of the world,

original: rang gi spyod yul du gnas par bsam mo //
analyzed: rang gi spyod yul du gnas par bsam mo //
translated: one should imagine them abiding within one's sphere of activity.

original: de'i 'og tu dpag bsam gyi mchod pa dbul ba dang / lhan cig tu rig sngags bzla zhing gar mkhan dang rol mo mkhan dang / glu mkhan la sogs pas dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dpag bsam gyi mchod pa dbul ba dang / lhan cig tu rig sngags bzla zhing gar mkhan dang rol mo mkhan dang / glu mkhan la sogs pas dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should offer the wish-fulfilling worship, and together with the awareness beings, one should delight them with dancers, musicians, singers, and so forth, reciting the awareness mantra.

original: aom a'a:hr'i: kalpa briksha h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a:hr'i: kalpa briksha h'um /
translated: O·πÉ ƒÅ·∏• hrƒ´·∏• kalpavriksa h≈´·πÉ.

original: nam zhig skyo bar gyur na yang //
analyzed: nam zhig skyo bar gyur na yang //
translated: When one becomes weary,

original: ye shes rten la bsdus nas su //
analyzed: ye shes rten la bsdus nas su //
translated: having withdrawn into the support of awareness,

original: dam tshig dran pa'i rgyas btab ste //
analyzed: dam tshig dran pa'i rgyas btab ste //
translated: one should seal it with the seal of mindfulness of the commitments.

original: tshogs brngar ba ni mkhas pa'i lugs //
analyzed: tshogs brngar ba ni mkhas pa'i lugs //
translated: The wise method is to offer the ga·πáacakra.
